name: The Great Kitchen Sink Defensive
description:
In this rudimentary tower defense game, play as the Elemental Soap Dispenser who protects the kitchen sink from the combined forces of Fork, Toothpick, and Steel Wool!

Controls:

-WASD to move

-Left Click on Bubble's Icon to place them nearby

-Walk into the Bubble and aim yourself, then Left Click to lauch

-Walked into a bubble by mistake? No problem! Right Click to cancel.

-Selected the wrong bubble to build? Right Click to cancel that as well!

Using the regular bubble will allow you to fire yourself into the enemy and deal damage upon impact!

The Electric Bubble will leave a trail of shocking suds that will damage the enemy as they traverse through it's path!

And the Fire Bubble which will cause an explosion over a small radius from the player!

Art: Geinel and Courtney Ridzon

Programmer: Bix Men

Sound Design and Music: Pablo Escalante
